headline: How Analyst Views on Eaton Are Shifting With AI and Data Center Growth
summary: Consensus analyst price targets for Eaton have edged higher, recently rising from $394.02 to $398.71. This increase reflects growing optimism, fueled by the company’s exposure to accelerating AI-driven capital investment and strong demand for data center infrastructure. Stay tuned to discover how you can keep up with the evolving narrative and future expectations for Eaton stock. What Wall Street Has Been Saying Recent commentary from Wall Street analysts paints a nuanced picture for Eaton,...
